PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 37 In addition , all polymers showed broader absorption in thin films compared to in solution due to stronger interchain aggregation.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption in thin films |
| absorption in solution |
| broader absorption |
| stronger interchain aggregation |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| broader absorption |
| stronger interchain aggregation |

Explanation: "All polymers" is a general statement and does not refer to a specific material property. "In thin films compared to in solution" is a comparison and does not clearly refer to a material property. "Due to stronger interchain aggregation" explains the cause of the broader absorption, so "broader absorption" and "stronger interchain aggregation" are the valid material properties.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 37 In addition , all polymers showed broader absorption in thin films compared to in solution due to stronger interchain aggregation.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| broader absorption in thin films |
| stronger interchain aggregation |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| broader absorption in thin films |
| stronger interchain aggregation |

These entities refer to material properties of the polymers. "Broader absorption in thin films" refers to the extent or range of absorption of light or other forms of radiation by the polymer thin films. "Stronger interchain aggregation" refers to the degree of clustering or association of polymer chains with each other.
